name: Super Demon Bowl
description:
SUPER DEMON BOWL

Gameplay Objective

Battle the meat creatures and lost souls of the underworld! Absorb their power to build your strength up and bowl your way to freedom!

Dash into opponents to defeat them and collect their dropped power. Collect enough meat to grow in size and progress to the next level. Cast ability (ground pound) with soul. Knock into demon pin when large enough to advance to the next level. Enjoy!

Controls:

Move = WASD

Dash = SHIFT

Ground Pound = Right Click

Theme: "Combination"

Demo version created by a team of 4 in 72 hours.
